name: Jumpie (Jk255)
description:
Thank you for playing this game. - Instructions -

[Arrow keys to move]

[A and D to switch between items when not in desk]

[Left and Right Keys to switch between items in desk]

[K to break wood or stone]

[P to place]

[J to open and Esc to leave the desk]

- Recipe -

Pickaxe - [Switch to wood press L then stone Press L]

Desk - [Switch to wood then press L then press G]

- Help -

[Pickaxes help to mine stone.]

[Pickaxes break after a few hits.]
